detailed_with_name: LeBron James is standing behind a podium, speaking into a microphone while gesturing with his right hand. He is wearing a grey suit jacket over a white shirt, accessorized with a gold chain and a pocket square, and has a confident expression against a purple-lit background.
detailed_no_name: A man is standing behind a podium, speaking into a microphone while gesturing with his right hand. He is wearing a grey suit jacket over a white shirt, accessorized with a gold chain and a pocket square, and has a confident expression against a purple-lit background.
summary_with_name: LeBron James speaks at an event in a grey suit.
summary_no_name: A man speaks at an event in a grey suit.
